properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:15PM CST until February 21 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Thursday February 20 until Friday February 21.
* At 07 PM Wednesday the stage was 13.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 15.2 feet on Friday February 21.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday February 20 and
continue to rise to near 15.2 feet by Friday February 21.The river
will fall below flood stage by Friday February 21.
* At 14.0 feet...Flooding of low-lying agricltural land is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Thursday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
